appError.label: Critical error
appError.description: Application faced a critical error and cannot be usable. Please contact {{ contact }}

error.fetchUser: Unable to retrieve user data. Try again later
error.logout: Unable to terminate your session. Try to clean browser cookies manually if issue persists

serverMessage.same_password: We do not recommend you to use the same password that you used before

formError.nameLength: Name should be minimum 1 and maximum 36 symbols length
formError.usernameInvalid: Username should consists only of letters, numbers and underscore
formError.usernameLength: Username should be minimum 3 and maximum 16 symbols length
formError.passwordMinimum: Password should be minimum {{ length }} characters length

error.fallback: Unable to verify email address. Try again later
error.description: An error occurred during verification. Please press "Try again" button

resend.label: Verify your email
resend.description: We've sent you a verification link. Please check your inbox

error.fallback: Unable to send email verification link. Try again later

success.fallback: Email verification link has been successfully send
